Name: Inductive Reasoning - IND
Text: The task requires writing a DuckDB SQL query based on an event log in a table called event_log with columns case_id activity timestamp

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: The query needs to find cases with the exact sequence Approve Purchase Requisition Create Order Confirm Order with no events in between Use window functions or self-joins to ensure the activities follow immediately in order

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Among cases with the sequence filter those where the time between Create Order and Confirm Order exceeds 5 days This step involves calculating the time difference using the timestamp column for the relevant activities

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Exclude cases meeting both the sequence and timing condition more than 5 days from the results Return all events from cases that either lack the sequence or have it with a time difference of 5 days or less

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Order events by case_id and timestamp to ensure chronological sequence analysis Use LEAD or LAG functions to verify direct succession of activities within each case

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Identify cases with the sequence Approve Purchase Requisition Create Order Confirm Order using row numbers ordered by timestamp Check for triples where row numbers rn rn1 rn2 correspond to the activities in sequence ensuring no events in between Found that cases must have at least one such triple to meet the sequence criteria

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: For cases with the sequence calculate the time difference between Create Order and Confirm Order for each triple Exclude cases where any triple shows a time difference greater than 5 days

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: To find cases for exclusion identify those with the sequence Approve Purchase Requisition Create Order Confirm Order where the time between Create Order and Confirm Order exceeds 5 days Use a CTE with row numbers to order events by timestamp within each case enabling sequence analysis

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Join the ranked events to form triples ensuring activities follow immediately with rn rn1 rn2
